sentences.en: Exercise is perhaps the most effective way to rejuvenate your skin.
sentences.cn: 锻炼可能是使皮肤恢复活力的最好手段.

sentences.en: I came back from holiday feeling rejuvenated.
sentences.cn: 我度假回来，感到恢复了活力。

sentences.en: It's time for congress to rejuvenate the sexual appetite of America.
sentences.cn: 现在需要国会振兴性食欲合众国.
现在就开始返老还童吧.

sentences.en: Physicians have tried for centuries to rejuvenate ailing paints with animal organs.
sentences.cn: 医生已试验了几个世纪用动物器官为病人做器官移植.

sentences.en: plans to rejuvenate the inner city areas

sentences.en: Rejuvenate Worldwide sells a skin serum that does wonders for your skin.
sentences.cn: 振兴全球销售一种皮肤血清但这对你的皮肤奇迹.

sentences.en: Rejuvenate Worldwide will also be expanding their product line continuously.
sentences.cn: 振兴全球也将不断扩大产品线.

sentences.en: Shelley was advised that the Italian climate would rejuvenate him.
sentences.cn: 有人建议雪莱去意大利，那里的天气会使他恢复活力。

sentences.en: The fresh mountain air will rejuvenate the middle - aged women.
sentences.cn: 山中的新鲜空气将使中年妇女恢复青春.

sentences.en: The most complete package to relax and rejuvenate you!
sentences.cn: 最完整的一揽子振兴你放心!

sentences.en: The mountain air will rejuvenate you.
sentences.cn: 山里的空气会使你恢复活力.

sentences.en: We must always change, renew, rejuvenate ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我们必须经常变化, 更新, 激发我们自己.

sentences.en: We must always change, renew, rejuvenate ourselves. otherwise we harden.
sentences.cn: 我们必须经常变化, 更新, 激发我们自己. 否则,我们就僵化了!

sentences.en: We should make it our duty to rejuvenate and stabilize our country.
sentences.cn: 我们应该以兴国安帮为己任.

sentences.en: You can change forms or ages and rejuvenate or kill.
sentences.cn: 您能改变人们的外貌或年龄也能拯救或毁灭他们.

words.tran_cn: [地质][水文] 回春，返老还童；复壮，恢复活力

trans.tran_cn: 使年轻, 使复原, 使恢复精神, 使恢复活力, 使回春, 使更新
